land4health 0.1.0

Package index

Vector-borne disease

l4h_dengue_cases() stable
Extract dengue case data from OpenDengue
l4h_layers_available_malaria() stable
List malaria layers by species & metric from Malaria Atlas Project

Human intervention

l4h_forest_loss() stable
Extracts forest cover loss within a defined polygon
l4h_night_lights() stable
Extracts global night‑time lights using harmonized DMSP‑OLS and VIIRS data
l4h_urban_rural_area() experimental
Extracts surface areas by urban and rural categories from GHS-SMOD
l4h_human_built() stable
Extracts built‑up surface area from GHSL Built‑Up Surface dataset

Accesibility

l4h_rural_access_index() stable
Compute Rural Access Index (RAI)
l4h_travel_time() stable
Travel Time to Healthcare or Cities (Oxford Dataset)

Enviroment

l4h_water_proportion() experimental
Annual Proportion of Water Coverage from MapBiomas Peru
l4h_co_column() stable
Extracts carbon monoxide (CO) concentration from Sentinel-5P TROPOMI
l4h_urban_heat_index() experimental
Calculates the Surface Urban Heat Island (SUHI) index using MODIS LST and GHS-SMOD

Climate

l4h_sebal_modis() stable
Download and process evapotranspiration data
l4h_surface_temp() stable
Extracts Land Surface Temperature (LST) from MODIS MOD11A1

Utils

l4h_install() experimental
Install Python dependencies for land4health package
l4h_list_metrics()
List available metrics in land4health
l4h_packages()
List all land4health packages
